page.title: 10Pastimes.
page.content: The people in Kirdford can join lots of clubs such as the womens institute. There are 23 members and they meet in Kirdford Village Hall. Activities include craft demonstrations,cookery courses and sports competitions. There is also a Young Farmers Club.They have about 30 members.The age range is 12-26 years old.Between October and May the members meet once a week but this is discontinued in the summer as most members are busy on their farms. First Kirdford and Plaistow Brownies meet at Kirdford Village Hall and they also have pack holidays and outtings during the year.The Drama Society has 20 members who meet regulaly at the Village Hall.Ten people build sets for productions.
